title: Daniel Jones
subtitle: CEO at Open Languages
text: We hired Alexander to develop our front end user interface to integrate with our virtual classroom for students. Alexander has proven to be an excellent front end developer with a unique attention to detail and quality. Alexander has gone on to develop not only the user interface but has developed a high quality proprietary system for our online language school. We will continue to work with him and can highly recommend him to anyone seeking a high quality front end web developer for todays demanding internet challenges.
